product_name: Sanuk Fraid Too Flip-Flops - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: When does summer start? When you slip on the comfortable women's Sanuk Fraid Too Flip-Flops and head outside. Cotton canvas straps wrap around feet for a perfect fit; soft polyester terrycloth linings wick moisture away for all-day comfort. Frayed canvas edge details give these flip-flops a worn, stylish look. Suede leather topsoles are soft against bare feet. High-rebound EVA midsoles mean comfort step after step. The Sanuk Fraid Too Flip-Flops feature lightweight and durable EVA outsoles. Closeout.
short_description: When does summer start? When you slip on the comfortable women's Sanuk Fraid Too Flip-Flops and head outside.
